 2003-02162003-02-18,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY,  , 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of SANDRA HARDY of Winnipeg, Manitoba, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
